com.adobe.granite.rest

Class RequestException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • java.lang.RuntimeException
          • com.adobe.granite.rest.RestException
            • com.adobe.granite.rest.RequestException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class RequestException
extends RestException
    The RequestException will be thrown if preconditions are not met to process the request or its allocated resource.
    See Also:
